fields.text: Welcome to Roofstock East Bay, where you can earn passive income by purchasing certified rental homes backed by our 30-day money-back guarantee.
To learn how to purchase inspected rental properties and start earning passive income, press [INDEX].
To browse our available East Bay rental homes with tenants in place, press [INDEX].
One moment please while we connect you to our property listings team.
To speak with an investment specialist about your next property purchase, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we transfer you to a Roofstock investment specialist.
For support with your existing account or property management, press [INDEX].
To review your current properties and tenant performance, press [INDEX].
Thank you for holding. We are now connecting you to property management support.
To get help with payments or billing inquiries, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we transfer you to our payments and billing department.
